In the field of Business Administration, marketing plays a crucial role in promoting and selling products or services. It involves understanding the target audience and creating strategies to reach them effectively. Finance, on the other hand, focuses on the management of money and includes activities like investment, borrowing, budgeting, saving, and forecasting. Organizational behavior is the study of how people interact within groups and it is applied to create more efficient business organizations. The study of these three areas is essential for the successful operation of any business.
Which area of Business Administration is primarily concerned with the management of money?
A. Marketing
B. Finance
C. Organizational Behavior
D. Public Relations
E. None of the above
